Using Modernizr with Opera Mini

Posted on January 9, 2014 by Anthony Dillon

We used Modernizr to provide fallbacks for unsupported features such as, svg’s, background-size, etc. On the new Canonical website. During browser testing I found Opera Mini does not support background-size (Opera specs) but Modernizr was reporting it does (Github issue). … Continue reading →

Posted on October 30, 2013 by Anthony Dillon

This is a simple couple of lines that can help your users see the URL of a link when printing our web page. a[href]:after {     content: " (" attr(href) ")"; }   a[href^="#"]:after, a[href^="javascript"]:after {     content: … Continue reading →
